data.name: Dungeonman Demo
data.detailed_description:
Dungeonman is the Original Card Battler/Dungeon Builder hybrid. This demo gives a taste of what's to come as our small team of three serious friends craft an online Card Battler like none other. We aim to give players unique tools to build and creatively tell the story as others battle through their Dungeons.

Campaign Demo:
You have been tasked by the humble folk of Glen's Dale to defeat a new aquatic evil! The Squizard has constructed an evil tower off the coast and has filled its halls with dangerous monsters- from smelly Grog Hobs to a confusing cult of Bee Worshippers. Customize your Deck of Cards as you battle upward in a series of turn-based battles. Hop on the back of your Borgy to trample the competition and call on a cast of Companions to fight alongside you.

Experimental Dungeon Builder:
What happens when the Squizard is finally defeated and Glen's Dale is free of threat?
Well, it's time to Deck Out Your Dungeon. Customize your new tower to your liking: choose what monsters go where, rewrite the story with a fun Mad-Libs style Quest Room editor, and give your Dungeon a worthy Title.
Save and play through your Dungeon and stay tuned for exciting upcoming features, including Online Dungeon Sharing- where you can download and play through other players creations!

data.short_description: DECK OUT YOUR DUNGEON! Try the Original Card Deck Battler/Dungeon Builder Hybrid as it is being developed. Battle through the first Campaign Dungeon and test out the experimental Dungeon Builder. Stay tuned as features like Online Dungeon Sharing will be rolled out for testing soon!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5- 2 Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Must have a 64-bit processor and operating system. Game may run below minimum requirements at a slower frame-rate.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5- 2 Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 670 2GB / AMD R9 280 better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Must have a 64-bit processor and operating system.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
